meanings.definition: Dobs (verb): to hit or strike with force
meanings.sent1: He dobs the ball hard during the game.
meanings.sent2: She dobs the nail into the wall to hang the picture.
meanings.sent3: The chef dobs the dough to make it flat for the pizza.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm dobs the trees with raindrops.
meanings.sent5: The hammer dobs the nail into the wood with a loud sound.

meanings.definition: Dobs (noun): a small, round object or lump
meanings.sent1: She found a shiny dobs of gold in the sand.
meanings.sent2: The artist used colorful dobs of paint to create a masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The child collected dobs of seashells along the shore.
meanings.sent4: The cake was decorated with sugary dobs of frosting.
meanings.sent5: The necklace was adorned with precious dobs of gemstones.

meanings.definition: Dobs (adjective): showing a lack of intelligence or awareness
meanings.sent1: His dobs mistake caused confusion in the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The dobs student forgot to bring his homework again.
meanings.sent3: The dobs puppy kept chasing its own tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The dobs decision led to unexpected consequences.
meanings.sent5: The dobs error in the code crashed the entire system.
